code: import React,{useState,useEffect}from'react';import ChatBot from'./ChatBot';import'./App.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function App(){const[chargers,setChargers]=useState([]);const[lat,setLat]=useState(-37.8136);const[lon,setLon]=useState(144.9631);useEffect(()=>{fetch("/api/charger?lat=".concat(lat,"&lon=").concat(lon)).then(res=>res.json()).then(setChargers).catch(err=>console.error('API fetch error:',err));},[lat,lon]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"App",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:"EV Charger Finder"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{value:lat,onChange:e=>setLat(+e.target.value)}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{value:lon,onChange:e=>setLon(+e.target.value)}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"card-container",children:chargers.map(ch=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"card",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{children:ch.AddressInfo.Title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:ch.AddressInfo.AddressLine1}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("a",{href:"https://maps.google.com/?q=".concat(ch.AddressInfo.Latitude,",").concat(ch.AddressInfo.Longitude),target:"_blank",children:"Map"})]},ch.ID))}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ChatBot,{})]});}export default App;
